message_1: What would be the Rail fence cipher encryption of the plaintext message "HELLO WORLD" using a rail fence of 3 levels?
message_2:
To encrypt the message "HELLO WORLD" using a Rail Fence cipher with 3 levels, we arrange the letters in a zigzag pattern with 3 rows:

H . . . O . . . R . . .
. E . L . W . L . D .
. . L . . . O . . . .

Now, we read the letters in each row from left to right to get the encrypted message:

HORELWLDLO

So, the Rail Fence cipher encryption of "HELLO WORLD" with 3 levels is "HORELWLDLO".
